Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5564 affecting package libndp for versions less than 1.8-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5564 affecting package libndp for versions less than 1.8-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libndp is earlier than 1.8-2, affected by CVE-2024-5564
